name: Dr. Doom
masterStrike: Each Player with exactly 6 cards in hand reveals a Black Hero or puts 2 cards from their hand on top of their deck

name: Loki
masterStrike: Each Player Reveals Green Hero or gains a wound.

name: Magneto
masterStrike: Each Player Reveals an X-Men Hero or discards down to four cards.

name: Red Skull
masterStrike: Each Player KOs a Hero from their hand.

name: Authoritarian Iron Man
masterStrike: Authoritarian Iron Man fortifies the next city space to his right, starting with the Bridge. You can't fight him while there's a Villain in that space.

name: Baron Helmut Zero
masterStrike: Each player KOs a Villain from their Victory Pile. Any player who cannot do so gains a Wound.

name: Maria Hill, Director of SHIELD
masterStrike: Two S.H.I.E.L.D. Officers enter the city as 3 Attack Villains. When you fight them, gain them as Heroes.

name: Misty Knight
masterStrike: Each player reveals 4 cards with Recruit icons or gains a Wound.

name: Ragnarok
masterStrike: Each player says 'zero' or 'not zero.' Then, each player discards all their cards with that cost.

name: Apocalypse
masterStrike: Each player reveals their hand and puts all their Heroes that cost 1 or more on top of their deck.

name: Kingpin
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Marvel Knights Hero or discards their hand and draws 5 cards.

name: Mephisto
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Marvel Knights Hero or gains a Wound.

name: Mr. Sinister
masterStrike: Mr. Sinister captures a Bystander. Then each player with exactly 6 cards reveals a RED Hero or discards cards equal to the number of Bystanders Mr. Sinister has.

name: Stryfe
masterStrike: Stack this Master Strike next to Stryfe. Stryfe gets +1 Attack for each Master Strike stacked next to him. Each player reveals an X-Force Hero or discards a card at random.

name: Madelyne Pryor, Goblin Queen
masterStrike: Madelyne captures 4 Bystanders. If she already had any Bystanders before that, then each player gains a Wound.

name: Nimrod, Super Sentinel
masterStrike: Each player who does not reveal a Tech Hero must choose Recruit or Attack, then discard all their cards with that icon.

name: Wasteland Hulk
masterStrike: Cross-Dimensional Hulk Rampage

name: Zombie Green Goblin
masterStrike: Rise of the Living Dead. KO each Hero in the HQ that costs 7 or more. Then, each player discards a card for each Hero in the KO pile that costs 7 or more.

name: Immortal Emperor Zheng-Zhu
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Hero that costs 7 or more, or they discard down to 3 cards.

name: King Hyperion
masterStrike: King Hyperion enters the city if he was not already there. Then, he charges three spaces. Escape: Each player gains a wound. Put King Hyperion on the Mastermind space.

name: Shiklah, the Demon Bride
masterStrike: Reveal the top three cards of the Villain Deck. Put all the Scheme Twists you revealed on top of the Villain Deck. Put the rest on the bottom of that deck in random order.

name: Spider-Queen
masterStrike: Each player puts a Spider-Infected from their Victory Pile into an empty city space. Any player who cannot do so gains a Wound.

name: Dr. Strange
masterStrike: Reveal the top three cards of the Adversary Deck. Put the Adversary you revealed with the highest printed Attack on top of that deck. Then play a Plot Twist from among the cards you revealed. Then put the rest of those cards on the bottom of that deck in random order.

name: Nick Fury
masterStrike: Stack this Strike next to Nick Fury. Then demolish each player once for each Strike stacked here.

name: Odin
masterStrike: Each player puts an Asgardian Warrior from their Victory Pile into an empty city space. Any player who cannot do so gains a Bindings.

name: Professor X
masterStrike: Choose the two highest-cost Allies in the Lair. Stack them next to Professor X as 'Telepathic Pawns.' Professor X gets +1 Attack for each Ally stacked next to him. Players can recrut the top Ally in the stack next to Professor X.

name: General Ross
masterStrike: General Ross Transforms, then Cross-Dimensional Hulk Rampage.

name: Illuminati, Secret Society
masterStrike: Each player reveals their hand and discards two cards that each cost between 1 and 4. The Illuminati Transform.

name: King Hulk, Sakaarson
masterStrike: Each player KO's a Warbound Villain from their Victory Pile or gains a Wound. King Hulk Transforms.

name: M.O.D.O.K.
masterStrike: Each player who can't Outwit M.O.D.O.K. gains a Wound, then M.O.D.O.K. Transforms.

name: The Red King
masterStrike: The Red King Transforms, then each player reveals a Tech card or gains a Wound.

name: The Sentry
masterStrike: The Sentry Transforms, then Cross-Dimensional Void Rampage.

name: Arcade
masterStrike: Arcade captures a random Bystander from each player's Victory Pile as a Human Shield. Each player who didn't have a Bystander gains a Wound instead.

name: Dark Phoenix
masterStrike: KO the top card of the Hero Deck and each card in the Hero Deck that shares a color with it. Shuffle the Hero Deck.

name: Deathbird
masterStrike: If there are already any Shi'ar Villains in the city, each player gains a Wound. Then this strike enters the city as a Shi'ar Battle Cruiser Token Villain with 7 Attack worth 5 VP.
notes: *Randomizer Note: Replace one henchmen group with a Shi'ar Henchmen Group

name: Mojo
masterStrike: Mojo captures a Human Shield. Each player reveals a Tech Hero or discards a card at random.

name: Onslaught
masterStrike: KO all Heroes Dominated by Onslaught. Then each player reveals their hand and chooses one of their non-grey Heroes. Onslaught Dominates those Heroes.

name: Shadow King
masterStrike: KO all Heroes Dominated by Shadow King. Then each player chooses a non-grey Hero from their discard pile. Shadow King Dominates those Heroes.

name: Ultron
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Tech Hero or puts a non-grey Hero from their discard pile into a 'Threat Analysis pile' next to Ultron. Ultron is Empowered by each color in his Threat Analysis pile.

name: Morgana Le Fay
masterStrike: Each player in turn reveals a Covert Hero or gains a 0-cost Hero or Wound from the KO pile.

name: Arnim Zola
masterStrike: For each Hero in the HQ that has less than 2 printed Attack, put that Hero on the bottom of the Hero Deck, and each player discards a card of that Hero's cost.

name: Baron Heinrich Zemo
masterStrike: Each player KOs a Bystander from their Victory Pile. Any player who cannot do so gains a Wound.

name: Fin Fang Foom
masterStrike: Demolish each player, then do it again for each Monsters Unleashed Villain in the city and Escape Pile.

name: Pagliacci
masterStrike: 1, 5: This card becomes a Scheme Twist that takes effect immediately. 2, 3, 4: Demolish each player.

name: Evil Deadpool
masterStrike: Without talking, each player simultaneously discards a card. Whoever discards the lowest-costing card (or tied for lowest) gains a Wound.

name: Macho Gomez
masterStrike: Put this Strike in front of you as a 'Bounty on Your Head.' Then, each player gains a Wound for each Bounty on them. Any number of times during your turn, you may pay 1 Recruit to move a Bounty from you to the player on your left.

name: J. Jonah Jameson
masterStrike: Each player Investigates their deck for a card and puts it into the Angry Mobs stack.

name: Galactus
masterStrike: Destroy the city space closest to Galactus. Any Villain there escapes. Put this Master Strike there. Galactus Wins: When the city is destroyed.

name: Mole Man
masterStrike: All Subterranea Villains in the city escape. If any Villains escaped this way, each player gains a Wound.

name: Supreme Intelligence of the Kree
masterStrike: The Supreme Intelligence gains a Shard. Then each player reveals their hand and discards each with cost equal to, and cost one higher than, the number of Shards on the Supreme Intelligence.

name: Thanos
masterStrike: Each player reveals their hand and puts one of their non-grey Heroes next to Thanos in a 'Bound Souls' pile.

name: Malekith the Accursed
masterStrike: Malekith captures a Villainous Weapon from the city or from any player's control or discard pile. Then this Master Strike enters the city as a Villainous Weapon called 'Darkspear' that gives +2 Attack. When you gain a Darkspear, it becomes a Thrown Artifact that gives +2 Attack when thrown.

name: Hela, Goddess of Death
masterStrike: This Strike enters the city as a 5 Attack 'Army of the Dead' Villain worth 3VP. Then choose a Villain worth 3VP or more from your Victory Pile (including an Army of the Dead) to enter the city. If you didn't have any, each player gains a Wound.

name: Magus
masterStrike: If there are already any Villains with Shards in the city, each player gains a Wound. Then this Strike enters the city as a 'Cosmic Wraith' Villain with 4 Attack worth 4 VP. Then put a Shard on each Villain in the city.

name: The Grandmaster
masterStrike: Reveal the top card of the Hero Deck then put it back. Contest of Champions for that card's color(s). Each player that loses gains a Wound. If the Grandmaster wins, he gains a Shard.

name: The Beyonder
masterStrike: Each player reveals a card that costs 5 or more or gains a Wound. Then put this Strike under an HQ space (that doesn't already have a Strike) pulling that space into a Pocket Dimension. To recruit a card from a Pocket Dimension, you must pay 1 Attack for each Pocket Dimension in play.

name: Charles Xavier, Professor of Crime
masterStrike: Four Heroes in the HQ capture Hidden Witnesses.

name: The Goblin, Underworld Boss
masterStrike: Two random Bystanders from each player's Victory Pile become Hidden Witnesses held by The Goblin. Any player who didn't have two Bystanders gains a Wound instead.

name: Carnage
masterStrike: Feast on each player. Whenever this Master Strike feasts on a player's 0-cost Hero, that player gains a Wound.

name: Mysterio
masterStrike: Shuffle this Master Strike into Mysterio's face down Mastermind Tactics. That card becomes a Mastermind Tactic worth 6 VP.

name: Grim Reaper
masterStrike: This Strike enters the city as a 7 Attack 'Graveyard' Location that says 'This gets +2 Attack while there's a Villain here.' It's Worth 5VP.

name: Mandarin
masterStrike: Each player chooses a Mandarin's Ring from their Victory Pile to enter the city. Any player who didn't have a Ring gains a Wound instead.

name: The Hood
masterStrike: Each player reveals the top 6 cards of their deck, discards all the non-grey Heroes revealed, and puts the rest back in any order.

name: Hydra High Council
masterStrike: Adapt

name: Hydra Super-Adaptoid
masterStrike: Adapt

name: Belasco, Demon Lord of Limbo
masterStrike: Sunlight: Each player KOs a non-grey Hero from their discard pile. Moonlight: Each player has a Waking Nightmare. KO Heroes discarded this way.

name: Emma Frost, The White Queen
masterStrike: Stack this Strike next to Emma Frost. Then each player has a Waking Nightmare for each Strike stacked here.

name: Uru-Enchanted Iron Man
masterStrike: Demolish each player. Then stack this Strike next to Iron Man. Uru-Enchanted Iron Man has an Uru-Enchanted Weapon for each Strike stacked here.

name: Hybrid
masterStrike: A Villain from the city Symbiote Bonds with Hybrid, If Hybrid was already bonded, then each player gains a Wound instead.

name: Poison Thanos
masterStrike: Each player reveals their hand and puts one of their non-grey Heroes next to Thanos in a Poisoned Souls: pile.

name: Maximus the Mad
masterStrike: Reveal one of Maximus' remaining Mastermind Tactics at random. Use its Fight effect, then shuffle it back into those Tactics.

name: Emperor Vulcan of the Shi'ar
masterStrike: Each player that doesn't have the Throne's Favor gains a Wound. Then Vulcan gains the Throne's

name: Annihilus
masterStrike: Reveal the top card of the Villain Deck. If it's a Bystander, Annihilus captures it. If it's a Villain, it enters the city, captures a Bystander, and moves forward an extra space (before doing any Ambush ability).

name: Kang the Conqueror
masterStrike: This Strike becomes a 'Time Incursion.' Put it above the rightmost city space that doesn't yet have a Time Incursion.

name: Bastion, Fused Sentinel
masterStrike: A card from the Bystander Stack ascends to become a 4 Attack 'Prime Sentinel' Mastermind with 'Fight: Rescue this. Master Strike: Each player reveals the top card of their deck and KOs it if it costs 1 or more.'
notes: *Randomizer Note: For Always Leads Replace a henchmen/villains with a Sentinal Group.

name: Exodus
masterStrike: Choose X-Men, X-Force, X-Factor, or Brotherhood. Each player discards one of those Heroes or gains a Wound.

name: Lady Deathstrike
masterStrike: If she is Preying on a player, Finish the Prey. Otherwise, Prey on the fewest 'Instinct'

name: Dormammu
masterStrike: Each player makes a Demonic Bargain with Dormammu to discard down to four cards.
set: Doctor Strange and the Shadows of Nightmare

name: Nightmare
masterStrike: Nightmare enters the Astral Plane. If he was already there, each player discards a random card.
set: Doctor Strange and the Shadows of Nightmare
